title: Amazing Spider-Man: Soul of the Hunter
description: In this sequel to the classic Kraven's Last Hunt, the web-slinger faces his greatest challenge: decline to fight Kraven, and he risks losing his own humanity.Fight for Kraven and lose...and risk forfeiting his own soul.J.M. DeMatteis, Mike Zeck and Bob McLeod combine their talents to bring you a tale even more shattering than their original work on Last Hunt.An nothing will ever be the same again.
author: J.M. DeMatteis
